hero.greeting: Hi, I'm Samuel and I'm a
hero.title: Fullstack Developer
hero.description: I find simple solutions to complex problems. Let's create something great together.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer from Slovakia. I focus on build web and mobile applications with a focus on maintainability and great user experience. I value good communication and straightforward collaboration. When I'm not working, I'm probably climbing something.

hydration.title: Hydration
hydration.description: Developed a stunning landing page for the biggest liquidity provider in the Polkadot cryptocurrency ecosystem.

linkpal.title: Linkpal
linkpal.description: Built a backlink exchange platform for simple organic collaboration between SEO experts.

kubo.title: KUBO Knihy
kubo.description: Developed a mobile app for KUBO Knihy, a book library platform where children can explore, read and learn.

imooptik.title: Imooptik
imooptik.description: Engineered a backoffice system for imooptik, a fast-growing chain of optical stores in Slovakia, to manage inventory, customers, and orders.

zssk.title: ZSSK Camera Control
zssk.description: Created an application integrated into the systems of ZSSK (Slovak Railway Company) for controlling and viewing camera feeds in trains.

basilisk.title: Basilisk
basilisk.description: Designed and developed a landing page for Basilisk, a decentralized exchange on the Polkadot blockchain.

century21.title: Century 21
century21.description: Worked as a part of the team to develop various features for Century 21, a real estate company in Czech Republic.

bytydoliny.title: Bytydoliny
bytydoliny.description: Created a website for Bytydoliny, showcasing their properties for sale via an interactive map.

ndrivers.title: NDrivers
ndrivers.description: Created a telegram application for NDrivers, providing an easy way for members to register for events.

ejoin.title: Ejoin
ejoin.description: Helped build a website for Ejoin, one of the largest EV charging station companies in Slovakia.

valery.name: Valery
valery.content: Incredible work using TypeScript and some kick ass design. Very accurate with delivery timelines and great communication

imrich.name: Peter Imrich
imrich.content: The delivered system is simple, fast and well-arranged, making day-to-day work much easier. Good initial product as well as ongoing support.

soos.name: Peter Soos
soos.content: I really appreciate our collaboration. Samuel delivers high quality work and always meets the deadline, which is crucial for us.

scalable-apis.title: Building Scalable APIs with Node.js
scalable-apis.description: Learn best practices for designing and implementing RESTful APIs that can handle millions of requests.

react-patterns.title: Modern React Patterns in 2024
react-patterns.description: Explore the latest patterns and techniques for building maintainable React applications.

typescript-tips.title: TypeScript Tips for Better Code
typescript-tips.description: Advanced TypeScript techniques that will make your code more type-safe and maintainable.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how we can work together.
contact.formDescription: Leave me a message and I'll get back to you soon.

crossroads.title: Welcome
crossroads.description: Where would you like to go?
crossroads.portfolioDescription: Check out my latest work and collaborate.
